spec_data.Name: perl-Net-DHCP
spec_data.Description:
Net::DHCP is a DHCP set of classes designed to handle basic DHCP
handling. It can be used to develop either client, server or relays.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:09:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Set of classes for basic handling of DHCP packets
